dc:title: Days With an End
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Repeats P. Maurin's fear that increased state regulation leads to fascism and undermines personal responsibility. However, agrees with Pius XI in his encyclical "Forty Years After", that the state may intervene when a particular group is threatened and no other means are available to them.
